name: DungeonScape (MadFinn Development Co.)
description:
DungeonScape was made in a week! It was created in a youtube video that you can watch here: Watch how I made it

  I challenged myself to make an RPG game in a week! This is the download page to it! It is not much but I think you might enjoy it for a short gaming experience.

  This game has about 10~ minutes of a story. The game itself was more of a challenge to see what I could do in a week's worth of time. I hope you guys enjoy the little game that this is!

This game is not finished. This game was made in a week! It has bugs, issues, and the game length is pretty short. Please have fun with it! Heads up:

Mac and Linux versions have not been tested.  Any and all feedback would be fantastic.

All questions and problems can be reported in the comments. 

Subscribe?

Please subscribe to my channel if you find yourself enjoying this game!

YouTube Website
